```{r sample, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)
library(magick)
library(multipanelfigure)

load("../data/ns_church_history.rdata")
page_img_file <- "../img/Neu_Schowe_Church_02.jpg"
page_text_de <- NS_Church_History$content[[2]][2]
page_text_en <- NS_Church_History$content[[2]][3]
```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
# instantiate
figure <- multi_panel_figure(
#   width = unit(15,"inches"),
#   height = unit(4,"inches"),
   columns = 4,
  rows = 1)


figure <- figure %>% 
   fill_panel(panel = page_img_file,scaling = "stretch",column = c(1,2)) %>% 
   fill_panel(tableGrob(page_text_de, theme = ttheme_default(base_size = 7)),
              row= 1,column = 3,panel_clip = "off") %>% 
   fill_panel(tableGrob(page_text_en, theme = ttheme_default(base_size = 7), rows = NULL),
              row= 1,column = 4,panel_clip = "off") 

figure
```
